mapper.sql: id, NAME, parent_id AS parentId, parent_top AS parentTop, image, create_date AS createDate, modify_date AS modifyDate, is_last_category AS isLastCategory, purchase_restrictions AS purchaseRestrictions, cover_image AS coverImage, category_label_id categoryLabelId
mapper.select: SELECT id, NAME, parent_id AS parentId, parent_top AS parentTop, image, create_date AS createDate, modify_date AS modifyDate, is_last_category AS isLastCategory, purchase_restrictions AS purchaseRestrictions, cover_image AS coverImage, category_label_id categoryLabelId FROM dj_basics_goods_category

SELECT
FROM dj_basics_goods_category where parent_id =#{parentId}
and FIND_IN_SET(#{categoryLabelId},category_label_id)
ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT id, name, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate FROM dj_basics_brand where id in( select brand_id from dj_basics_category_brand where category_id =#{categoryId} group by brand_id ) ORDER BY create_date desc
